title: im not in the club i made?
body:
when i go the the clubs page it says im not in one even though i made it and was the creator?my friend says im still in it and cant invite me?
edit:plz rito

replies.body:
Oooof, still having issues seeing your club, huh? That sucks!

Let's get this sorted out together by having you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our specialists will be happy to work with you further on this~
